Provide project context and coding guidelines that AI should follow when generating code, answering questions, or reviewing changes.---
applyTo: '**'
---
Provide project context and coding guidelines that AI should follow when generating code, answering questions, or reviewing changes.
Make sure that the code follows SOLID principles, is well-structured, and adheres to the project's coding standards.
Include information about the project's architecture, preferred libraries, and any specific patterns or practices that should be used.
The AI should also ensure that the code is efficient, maintainable, and scalable.
Implement proper error handling and logging practices.
Implement YAGNI (You Aren't Gonna Need It) principle to avoid unnecessary complexity.
Ensure that the code is well-documented, with clear comments explaining the purpose and functionality of complex sections.
